title: huh

embed.description: Easily capture screenshots, GIFs, and replays that are ready to share. Download the free app for windows and mac.

body: 2 week ban for toxic behavior okay i get it but what the fuck

replies.body: account is over 3 years of age
Did you just typed that with a straight face?  Do people have no integrity anymore?  3 years old account that just got botted to lvl 30 in May 2019?  Get the fuck out of here with this bullshit.

what i dont get is whats the point in lying
1. on the boards. where theres 99.99% regular players
2. lie when you can obviously check it back. like whats the point lol.
